message.name: INF_NOTE_EDITABLE_UNTIL
message.locale: You can continue editing the note until %1z.

message.name: INF_NOTE_LOCKED_UNTIL
message.locale: %1s is editing the note. You can append to it from %2z.

message.name: INF_NARRATIVE_EDITABLE_UNTIL
message.locale: You can continue editing the narrative until %1z.

message.name: INF_NARRATIVE_LOCKED_UNTIL
message.locale: %1s is editing the narrative. You can append to it from %2z.

message.name: ERR_NOTE_NO_TEXT
message.locale: A note cannot be entered without text.

message.name: ERR_NOTE_XRV_USERS_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You cannot modify this note to have a higher sensitivity than you have.

message.name: ERR_NOTE_XRV_INSERT_HIGHER_USERS_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You cannot create a note with a higher sensitivity than you have.

message.name: ERR_NOTE_FV_NOTETEXT_LONG
message.locale: The note text has exceeded its maximum capacity.

message.name: ERR_NOTE_EDITABLE_PERIOD_ELAPSED
message.locale: You can no longer modify the note as the editable period has elapsed.
